hints.title: C^∞ Regularity of Z-Score
hints.content:
4405: :label: thm-cinf-regularity-zscore-full
4406: 
4407: The Z-score $Z_\rho^{(i)}$ is C^∞ with respect to $(x_i, v_i)$ with derivative bounds:
4408: 
4409: For $m \geq 1$:
4410: 
4411: $$
4412: \|\nabla^m Z_\rho^{(i)}\| \leq C_{Z,m}(\rho) \cdot \rho^{-m}
4413: 
4414: $$
hints.raw_directive:
4402: ### 11.1 C^∞ Regularity of Z-Score
4403: 
4404: :::{prf:theorem} C^∞ Regularity of Z-Score
4405: :label: thm-cinf-regularity-zscore-full
4406: 
4407: The Z-score $Z_\rho^{(i)}$ is C^∞ with respect to $(x_i, v_i)$ with derivative bounds:
4408: 
4409: For $m \geq 1$:
4410: 
4411: $$
4412: \|\nabla^m Z_\rho^{(i)}\| \leq C_{Z,m}(\rho) \cdot \rho^{-m}
4413: 
4414: $$
4415:

hints.label: proof-thm-cinf-regularity-zscore-full
hints.content:
4420: :label: proof-thm-cinf-regularity-zscore-full
4421: 
4422: **Step 1: Well-definedness.**
4423: 
4424: Since $\sigma'_\rho(i) \geq \eta_{\min} > 0$ (by {prf:ref}`lem-properties-regularized-std-dev-full`), the quotient is well-defined everywhere.
4425: 
4426: **Step 2: Smoothness.**
4427: 
4428: Both numerator and denominator are C^∞:
4429: - $d_i - \mu_\rho^{(i)} \in C^\infty$ (measurements and localized mean)
4430: - $\sigma'_\rho(i) \in C^\infty$ (regularized std dev)
4431: 
4432: Therefore $Z_\rho^{(i)} \in C^\infty$ by smoothness of quotients with non-vanishing denominator.
4433: 
4434: **Step 3: First derivative via quotient rule.**
4435: 
4436: $$
4437: \nabla Z_\rho^{(i)} = \frac{\nabla(d_i - \mu_\rho) \cdot \sigma'_\rho - (d_i - \mu_\rho) \cdot \nabla \sigma'_\rho}{(\sigma'_\rho)^2}
4438: 
4439: $$
4440: 
4441: Bounding each term:
4442: - $\|\nabla d_i\| = \mathcal{O}(1)$ (companion coupling)
4443: - $\|\nabla \mu_\rho\| \leq C_\mu \rho^{-1}$
4444: - $|d_i - \mu_\rho| \leq \text{diam}(d) = \mathcal{O}(1)$
4445: - $\|\nabla \sigma'_\rho\| \leq C_{\sigma'} \eta_{\min}^{-1} \rho^{-1}$
4446: - $\sigma'_\rho \geq \eta_{\min}$
4447: 
4448: Therefore:
4449: 
4450: $$
4451: \|\nabla Z_\rho^{(i)}\| \leq \frac{\mathcal{O}(\rho^{-1}) + \mathcal{O}(\eta_{\min}^{-1} \rho^{-1})}{\eta_{\min}^2} = \mathcal{O}(\eta_{\min}^{-3} \rho^{-1})
4452: 
4453: $$
4454: 
4455: **Step 4: Higher derivatives via generalized quotient rule.**
4456: 
4457: For $m \geq 2$, the $m$-th derivative of a quotient $f/g$ is given by:
4458: 
4459: $$
4460: \nabla^m \left(\frac{f}{g}\right) = \frac{1}{g} \sum_{k=0}^m \binom{m}{k} \nabla^k f \cdot \nabla^{m-k}\left(\frac{1}{g}\right)
4461: 
4462: $$
4463: 
4464: where derivatives of $1/g$ satisfy:
4465: 
4466: $$
4467: \nabla^{m}\left(\frac{1}{g}\right) = \sum_{\text{partitions}} c_{\text{partition}} \cdot g^{-(n_1+\cdots+n_m+1)} \cdot \prod_{j=1}^m (\nabla^j g)^{n_j}
4468: 
4469: $$
4470: 
4471: Using:
4472: - $\|\nabla^k (d_i - \mu_\rho)\| \leq C_\mu^{(k)} \rho^{-k}$ (from {prf:ref}`lem-mth-derivative-localized-mean-full`)
4473: - $\|\nabla^j \sigma'_\rho\| \leq C_{\sigma',j} \eta_{\min}^{-(2j-1)} \rho^{-j}$
4474: - $\sigma'_\rho \geq \eta_{\min}$
4475: 
4476: We get:
4477: 
4478: $$
4479: \|\nabla^m Z_\rho^{(i)}\| \leq C_{Z,m}(\rho) \cdot \rho^{-m}
4480: 
4481: $$
4482: 
4483: where the constant:
4484: 
4485: $$
4486: C_{Z,m}(\rho) = \mathcal{O}(m! \cdot \rho^{2dm} \cdot \eta_{\min}^{-(2m+1)})
4487: 
4488: $$
4489: 
4490: accounts for:
4491: - Factorial growth from combinatorial quotient rule terms: $m!$
4492: - Localization radius factors: $\rho^{2dm}$
4493: - Inverse powers of regularization: $\eta_{\min}^{-(2m+1)}$
